LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.label: prosthetic foot
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.description: A foot prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real foot. Requires prosthetics research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToe.label: prosthetic toe
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticToe.description: A toe prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real toe. Requires prosthetics research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.label: prosthetic hand
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.description: A hand prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real hand. Requires prosthetics research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFinger.label: prosthetic finger
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFinger.description: A finger prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real finger. Requires prosthetics research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticJaw.label: prosthetic jaw
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticJaw.description: A jaw prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real jaw. Requires prosthetics research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClavicle.label: prosthetic clavicle
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticClavicle.description: A clavicle prosthesis. It is inferior to a real clavicle. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticSternum.description: A sternum prosthesis. It is inferior to a real sternum. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticRib.description: A rib prosthesis. It is inferior to a real rib. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticPelvis.description: A pelvis prosthesis. It is inferior to a real pelvis. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHumerus.description: A humerus prosthesis. It is inferior to a real humerus. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

LanguageData.SimpleProstheticRadius.description: A radius prosthesis. It is inferior to a real radius. Requires bone replacement research to install it.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFemur.label: prosthetic femur
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFemur.description: A femur prosthesis. It is inferior to a real femur. Requires bone replacement research to install it.
